DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical study compare Nidek RS-3000 Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) device Optovue RTVue OCT . The secondary objective evaluate adverse event find clinical study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects legal age full legal capacity volunteer date inform consent sign . 2 . Subjects follow instruction Principal/Clinical Investigator clinical staff clinical site , visit schedule examination date . 3 . Subjects sign inform consent form participate clinical study . 4 . Subjects agree take qualify examination RS3000 RTVue data acquisition . 1 . Diabetes mellitus ( DM ) and/or diabetic retinopathy 2 . Hypertension ( HT ) 3 . Cerebral infarction , cerebral hemorrhage , cranial nerve neoplasm central nervous system diseases affect vision 4 . Cardiac , hepatic , renal hematologic diseases 5 . Current systemic administration steroid 6 . History anticancer agent etc . 7 . Opticallystimulated epileptic seizure 8 . Dementia 9 . Subjects life threaten debilitate systemic disease NOTE : Additional detail inclusion/exclusion ophthalmic criterion dependent upon study population also exist
DOC.keyword: Viewing axial cross sectional imaging ocular
